reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's beauty, particularly the pearl straps that add elegance, and appreciate its fit, stretchiness, and vibrant red color. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some find it nice, others describe it as cheap and thin. Moreover, the dress's durability is concerning, with customers reporting that the pearl straps break very easily. Additionally, several customers mention receiving their dress without the pearl straps. " Beautiful dress . My granddaughter looked amazing for homecoming. Her other dress was not a good fit, so 1 day before homecoming, this beauty arrived." items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just right fit
items.body: The dress is cute. Color same as picture. Sizing for medium at 130 is perfecto. Pearl straps add a touch of elegance. Material is of good quality and soft. None see through. Length good and split is just right. Read more
items.author: Faye

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great true to size!
items.body: Bought this for NYE party. Fits like a dream. True to size and very sexy/flirty dress! Very stretchy will fit easily and I love the fabric! The pearl straps are a nice touch! Read more
items.author: Jerel Hotaling

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute dress.
items.body: Super cuteeeee. Get the dress. Wore it to a wedding and was stunning. It had no smell and fit like a glove! I got a small I'm 135 and 5'7. Fabric feels good on the skin. And worth every penny. Read more
items.author: Kitty Ross

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The colors is beautiful. The material is beautiful although the straps do need work.
items.body: So overall, the dress was beautiful. Right out of the package, the pearl straps broke. That was no problem because I fixed it. But then as I put on the dress to go out to my event, it broke once again so I had to fix it once again, but with the stronger I had to add a stronger piece to hold it together. For this dress being the price it is they need to make more sturdy, pearl straps. Other than that it was a beautiful dress. I wear a size medium, so I bought a size medium perfect!! Read more
items.author: Marlaina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sexy dress
items.body: I ordered the dress in two sizes LG and EXLG. The large fit perfectly and material is very stretchey. I'm 5'4" and 210. I had no problem with the pearl straps, but you will need help attaching because you have to wait until you have dress on your body. Read more
items.author: venetta steward

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sexy Dress
items.body: Love the dress. Material is thin, but wearable. Can put a seamless spanking on and still look good. The beads on the straps may break, so be careful putting dress on. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully made dress
items.body: Fabric is so soft and the dress forms to your body perfectly. I’m 5’1 and was nervous it would be too long but the length was perfect and the color matches the picture perfectly. Read more
items.author: Sherri Scantling

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Beautiful dress I love the pearls on shoulders material not bad, soft. My only trouble was pulling my dress down because it kept raising up. Read more
items.author: Shoronda Johnson

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, S-coffee, Blue, T-pink, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
